get.description: Retrieve a list of dsc compilation jobs.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Name of an Azure Resource group.

parameters.name: automationAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the automation account.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

default.description: Automation error response describing why the operation failed.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

schema.description: Error response of an operation failure

DscCompilationJob.description: Definition of the Dsc Compilation job.

id.description: Fully qualified resource Id for the resource

allOf.description: The core properties of ARM resources

location.description: Gets or sets the location of the resource.

name.description: Gets or sets name of the resource.

tags.description: Gets or sets the tags attached to the resource.

DscCompilationJobCreateParameters.description: The parameters supplied to the create compilation job operation.

incrementNodeConfigurationBuild.description: If a new build version of NodeConfiguration is required.

parameters.description: Gets or sets the parameters of the job.

DscCompilationJobCreateProperties.description: The parameters supplied to the create compilation job operation.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets the next link.

value.description: Gets or sets a list of Dsc Compilation jobs.

DscCompilationJobListResult.description: The response model for the list job operation.

creationTime.description: Gets the creation time of the job.

endTime.description: Gets the end time of the job.

exception.description: Gets the exception of the job.

jobId.description: Gets the id of the job.

lastModifiedTime.description: Gets the last modified time of the job.

lastStatusModifiedTime.description: Gets the last status modified time of the job.

parameters.description: Gets or sets the parameters of the job.

runOn.description: Gets or sets the runOn which specifies the group name where the job is to be executed.

startTime.description: Gets the start time of the job.

startedBy.description: Gets the compilation job started by.

status.description: Gets or sets the status of the job.

statusDetails.description: Gets or sets the status details of the job.

DscCompilationJobProperties.description: Definition of Dsc Compilation job properties.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the Dsc configuration.

DscConfigurationAssociationProperty.description: The Dsc configuration property associated with the entity.

JobProvisioningStateProperty.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

id.description: Gets or sets the id of the resource.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets the next link.

JobStreamListResult.description: The response model for the list job stream operation.

jobStreamId.description: Gets or sets the id of the job stream.

streamText.description: Gets or sets the stream text.

streamType.description: Gets or sets the stream type.

time.description: Gets or sets the creation time of the job.

value.description: Gets or sets the values of the job stream.
